https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/lz4UBRaIrhFzatqtzGtNAkXdSEZ.jpg Driverless is about three love stories that are intertwined by a car accident. It deals with several relationship issues, including the infamous seven year itch, reuniting with a first love, one night stands, an old husband with a young wife, and extramarital affairs.
